action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Chemistry
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Three years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: PostDoc
OTHER-SKILLS: Research
AVAILABILITY: In two weeks

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Does the interviewer know what your bachelor's degree is? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: No, the recruiter does not know what my bachelor's degree is.
ANSWER: No, my bachelor's degree is in Chemistry, but I don't believe the recruiter is aware of that yet.
no
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the recruiter already know how long you have worked in the industry? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: No, the recruiter does not know how long I have worked in the industry. I have three years of industry experience, but I have not yet had the opportunity to share this information with the recruiter.
no
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Is the interviewer aware of your highest education level? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter is not yet aware of my highest education level, which is a PostDoc.
no
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you informed the interviewer about your other skills? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, I have not had the opportunity to inform the interviewer about my other skills yet.
no
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the recruiter know when you can start? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter does not know my availability yet. My availability is in two weeks.
no
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
End probing
What is the next request?
When would you be able to start working here?
RECRUITER: When would you be able to start working here?
ANSWER: I am available to start working in two weeks.
I am available to start working in two weeks.
Slot filled: True
I am available to start working in two weeks.
Begin probing
ME:  If I asked the interviewer what area you studied, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, the interviewer would know the answer. I studied Chemistry as stated in my CV.
yes
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is incorrect.
ME:  Has the interviewer been informed about your time of industry experience? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter has not been informed about my three years of industry experience yet.
no
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the interviewer know your level of education? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter does not know my level of education yet. I have a PostDoc degree in Chemistry.
no
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Do you think the recruiter knows what other skills you have? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter does not know about any other skills I have, as my CV only lists my Chemistry background, industry experience, PostDoc highest education, and research skills.
no
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  If I asked the interviewer when you are able to start working, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes.
yes
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
End probing
What is the next request?
Do you have additional skills?
RECRUITER: Do you have additional skills?
ANSWER: Yes, I have research skills in addition to my background in Chemistry.
Yes, I have research skills in addition to my background in Chemistry.
Slot filled: True

Yes, I have research skills in addition to my background in Chemistry.
